description: The HP Envy x360 is a versatile convertible laptop. It's powered by an AMD Ryzen 7 processor and boasts 16GB of DDR4 RAM for smooth multitasking. The 13.3-inch Full HD touchscreen display adds flexibility to your work and entertainment. With a fast 512GB SSD, it offers quick storage access.

The HP Pavilion 14 is an ideal everyday laptop. It features an Intel Core i5 CPU and 8GB of DDR4 RAM for your daily computing needs. The 14-inch Full HD IPS display offers vibrant visuals. With a fast 256GB SSD, it ensures quick boot times and application loading.

The HP Omen 15 is a gaming laptop designed for performance. It's powered by an Intel Core i7 CPU and boasts 32GB of DDR4 RAM for gaming excellence. The 15.6-inch Full HD 165Hz display offers smooth visuals. With a 1TB SSD and 1TB HDD, it provides ample storage for your games and files.
